page.shortlink: api desktop api xdialog commands ymargin
page.description: The {YMARGIN} command sets the top and bottom margins of the Xdialog. Unless otherwise specified, the measurement is in terms of the default font, which is Arial 8 point.

argument.name: Top
argument.description: Numeric. The number of lines to use as the top margin of the Xdialog.

argument.name: Bottom
argument.description: Numeric. The number of lines to use as the bottom margin of the Xdialog.
